request.description:
The user should have `sme_basic_role` role to access the endpoint (role name may change in future)

Sorting by `created`, `senderName`, `status` properties is supported via `sort` parameter. Adding `-` sign to the parameter value will change sort direction to descending. Up to 2 values can be used at once to sort the results (comma-separated)

Filtering by `status` is supported via GET-parameter `status`. Accepted values are `new` and `opened`

Pagination is supported using `page`, `page_size`, `limit` parameters

response.name: Get shared presentation links

request.description:
The route is `/data/presentation/:presentationId/link/:presentationLinkId`
The user should have `sme_basic_role` role to access the endpoint (role name may change in future).
Only status property can be patched. Accepted values are `"new"` and `"opened"`
